snippet: Charities expressed outrage on Friday as the mayor of French port Calais, which has symbolised Europe's refugee crisis, signed a ban on gatherings that could stop aid groups distributing meals to migrants and refugees....

headline.main: McAuley Closing In on New West Brom Deal
headline.print_headline: McAuley Closing In on New West Brom Deal

lead_paragraph: Charities expressed outrage on Friday as the mayor of French port Calais, which has symbolised Europe's refugee crisis, signed a ban on gatherings that could stop aid groups distributing meals to migrants and refugees.
